support_subject.message: Ask help for Instagram Reels & Post Comments Exporter to CSV- IGMate

support_body.message: Hi, I have some issues when using the extension, need your help:

pop_guide_quik_title1.message: Copy Instagram post's or Reels' link

pop_guide_quik_desc1.message: Click the three dots in the top-right corner of the post and select Copy link

pop_guide_quik_desc2.message: Paste the post link you just copied. Tip: If you open the extension on the post details page, the post link should be pasted automatically.

pop_guide_quik_desc4.message: Supports CSV, Excel, and JSON formats

pop_guide_tip1.message: Advanced fields such as email and phone require longer download times

pop_guide_tip2.message: Suggest using balanced mode security settings to reduce the risk of account suspension

pop_guide_tip3.message: You can pause and resume at any time during the download process

pop_guide_tip4.message: The historical records will be saved for easy re export at any time

pop_validate_tip3.message: The link is valid and you can start downloading

pop_validate_tip.message: Support Post and Reels type posts
